    • keplerian.gameFramework.Scene

    public abstract class Scene
extends Object
    Author:

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Scene currScene
      Current scene - used when moving from scene to scene,
      protected ArrayList<Entity> entities
      List of all entities in the scene.
      static Scene NO_SCENE 
      protected UserInterface UI
      User Interface currently in use.Each scene must have SOME way of communicating with the user, but the exact nature is optional.
